AKCSE.organization: Association of Korean Scientists and Engineers, University of Waterloo

roles.title: Marketing Specialist
roles.point: Designed Instagram posters and wrote Instagram captions

roles.title: Events Coordinator
roles.point: Planned events targetting Korean-Canadian students in UW.

roles.title: Events Lead
roles.point: Led 10-member events team to successfully run 8 events (In-person + Online) during Winter and Spring term.

roles.title: Development Lead
roles.point: Led the development of AKCSE UW official website in a 4-member team, launched the website in August.
